production.home.todo.title: Today's Tasks ({date})
production.home.todo.subtitle: Keep an eye on today's priorities to align production planning and process management.
production.home.todo.items.plan: Complete weekly production plan review and assign tasks
production.home.todo.items.schedule: Coordinate production line scheduling and equipment maintenance
production.home.todo.items.material: Review material requirements and arrange procurement
production.home.todo.items.equipment: Review equipment status and handle exceptions
production.home.todo.items.review: Review production efficiency data and prepare report
